name: King of Tiny Mountain
description:
Created for the Ludum Dare #36 Jam.

A Single-Screen Isometric 3D platformer and Twin-Stick shooter. Collect Golden Pyramids to gain access to new areas and eventually battle the King of Tiny Mountain.

Ludum Dare Page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/king-of-tiny-mountain

Controls:

Keyboard:
WASD - Move
Arrow Keys - Shoot
Space Bar - Jump

Controller:
Left Analog - Move
Right Analog - Shoot
Shoulder Buttons - Jump
